input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
2LUV Plus Women's Stripe Knit Sheer Back Plus Size Top

Product specifications:
66% POLYESTER 30% RAYON 4% SPANDEX CONTRAST 100% POLYESTER
This top features a scoop neckline with short sleeves, stripe front complete with a back sheer material.
Made In USA
true to size

Product description:
input_text.Response A: When you buy a 2LUV product, you're going to LUV it! Our Plus Size Stripe Knit Sheer Back Top is very versatile and can easily be worn year round. This top features a scoop neckline with short sleeves, stripe front complete with a back sheer material. This fun top is made in the USA with 66% POLYESTER 30% RAYON 4% SPANDEX CONTRAST 100% POLYESTER. It is a great quality top that is true to size.
input_text.Response B: Feel effortlessly chic in this gorgeous top! The sheer material is perfectly matched with the bold stripes, creating a look that is both classic and modern. The scoop neckline gives a hint of sexy, while the short sleeves add a touch of sophistication. The back of the top is sheer, revealing just a little bit of skin, which will keep you cool and comfortable on hot summer days. Made in the USA, this top is true to size and will be the perfect addition to your wardrobe.
